title: Ultrahigh voltage direct current quasi-tribovoltaic nanogenerator by switchable tribo-bias induction and deposited charge extraction
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01067A, Paper
Xuemei Zhang, Dahu Ren, Huiyuan Wu, Jian Wang, Xiaochuan Li, Huake Yang, Qianying Li, Qianxi Yang, Jinrong Zhu, Yi Xi
An inventive semiconductor-free design of insulator-based quasi-TVNG (I-Q-TVNG) ingeniously utilizes the rich tribo-charges on the insulator to construct strong tribo-bias to attain remarkable performance in voltage, power, stability, and durability.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
